faqs.question: What types of property ownership documents must I verify before finalizing a purchase
faqs.answer: Critical documents include the Mother Deed tracing ownership history the Sale Deed or Conveyance Deed confirming current ownership the Khata Certificate or equivalent property record showing assessment details and the latest property tax receipts ensuring no outstanding dues. Additionally scrutinize the Encumbrance Certificate for any legal liabilities or mortgages against the property. Our specialized legal team handles this comprehensive verification process for every client ensuring a clear title.

faqs.question: Are there restrictions on renovations or additions once I buy an older house in Sector 27
faqs.answer: Yes renovations and additions must strictly adhere to the local municipal building bylaws and floor-area ratio FAR regulations specific to Sector 27.
